## Foundry NFT
1. BasicNft: we are creating an IPFS hosted NFT of a pug 
2. MoodNft: we are creating an SVG NFT hosted on-chain

Happy SVG: data:image/svg+xml;base64,

Sad SVG: data:image/svg+xml;base64,

example svg:
